snippet: The words are full of passion, but the senator and his followers speak to an angry vision of a broken system that requires fundamental change.
abstract: Democratic presidential candidate Sen Bernie Sanders has tapped into enthusiasm that propelled 2008 Obama campaign, welcoming disaffected Democrats to what he calls 'the political revolution of 2015'; socialist-leaning Democrat's angry call for uprising against establishment comes amid scant belief that it will happen.
lead_paragraph: The words are full of passion, but the senator and his followers speak to an angry vision of a broken system that requires fundamental change.

headline.main: Bernie Sanders Draws Big Crowds to His ‘Political Revolution’
headline.print_headline: Sanders Draws Big Crowds to His ‘Revolution’
